sentences.sContent: The governor announced a new plan to reduce crime.

sentences.sContent: The helmet law should reduce injuries in motorcycle accidents.
sentences.sCn: 头盔法的实施应该能减少摩托车事故的受伤率。

sentences.sContent: Small businesses will need to reduce costs in order to survive.
sentences.sCn: 小企业要想生存必须削减成本。
